title: Parameters for RoI Cluster Fusion Node

fusion_distance.description: If the detected object's distance is less than its value, the fusion will be processed.

trust_object_distance.description: If the detected object's distance is less than its value, IoU method specified in `trust_object_iou_mode` is used, otherwise `non_trust_object_iou_mode` is used.

trust_object_iou_mode.description: Name of IoU method applied to the objects in range of [0.0, `trust_distance`].

non_trust_object_iou_mode.description: Name of IoU method applied to the objects in range of [`trust_distance`, `fusion_distance`], if `trust_distance` < `fusion_distance`.

use_cluster_semantic_type.description: If this parameter is false, label of cluster objects will be reset to UNKNOWN.

only_allow_inside_cluster.description: If this parameter is true, only clusters in which all their points are inside the RoI can be assigned to the RoI.

roi_scale_factor.description: A scale factor for resizing RoI while checking if cluster points are inside the RoI.

iou_threshold.description: An IoU score threshold. Note that the total IoU score is the sum of the IoU scores that are set to true in use_iou, use_iou_x and use_iou_y.

unknown_iou_threshold.description: A threshold value of IoU score for objects labeled UNKNOWN.

remove_unknown.description: If this parameter is true, all of objects labeled UNKNOWN will be removed in post-process.
